title: Wht happening to the client i need to reconnect 4 or 5 time to enter a game !

replies.body: If you're disconnecting that much, let's take a step back and double check that your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) are all set up in the best way for League to run. Let me know if none of the steps in that guide are helping and we can dig a little further!
